title: DISCUSSING THE BRYCE HALL VS FAITH ORDWAY DRAMA — BFFs EP. 60
description:
We’re back for our first episode of the new year to discuss the recent drama between Bryce Hall and Faith Ordway, Jake Paul vs Dana White, and Tristan Thompson getting caught cheating on Khloe again. We play a game of 2022 Predictions.
